short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how many words are left to guess from.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every guess in Wordle eliminates words from the pool of available guesses. This extension shows you how many words are left in the word list that are a possible solution.
